mouseClicked

void mouseClicked(int stateID,
                  int transitionID,
                  java.awt.geom.Point2D.Float point)
Use to handle the event of mouse click on the canvas.

Parameters:
stateID - indicates if it is clicked on a state, if it is, the value is the id of this state.
transitionID - indicates if it is clicked on a transition, if it is, the value is the id of this state.
point - indicates the coordinate on the canvas.

setTransitionLabel

void setTransitionLabel(int transitionID,
                        Automata2.Label label,
                        java.lang.String text)
Use to set the label of a transition.

Parameters:
transitionID - indicates which transition is selected.
Label - is the new label of this transition.
text - is the string version of the param label.
